summary: An ordinance providing for the improvement of The Alley between Blocks 13 and 14, Evans & Blewett's Addition, being the alley between 5th Avenue West and 6th Avenue West, from West Howe Street to West Crockett Street and certain other alleys, by paving and otherwise improving the same; all in accordance with Resolution No. 13997 of the City Council of the City of Seattle, creating a local improvement district therefor, and providing that payment for said improvement be made by special assessments upon property in said district payable by the mode of "Payment by Bonds".
